column5: Hey. I'm new here and was wondering if i could get some help, i live in North York, Toronto, Ont, and have a father with i real bad leg, he can walk but not for long periods of time. we don't have a boat, it getting hard for me to find places to take him fishing. If you guys have any place you know of that has good shore fishing or excusable river fishing plz get back to me. fished a couple of place out east like campbellford, Round Lake and Trenton and a couple up north like innisfil , nottawasaga, Bradford  if you can plz help me out that would be great.    Plus i love Crick Fishing so if you guys know any good places, that would be great to.  Thank you Daniel R.
I cannot help you with the fishing spots but like to welcome you to OFC I'm sure someone will chime in with some good info!!! Leechman
Try a lake or river And welcome...
Not from the area, but can I suggest a pier in the area? or a flat part. Try zooming in on Google maps using satellite view near your nearest body of water.
